segments.text: Near the boy, a girl stands patiently on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's facing him and the open cabinet, clearly part of this secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her arms is raised towards the jar, palm open and ready.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so attentive and expectant, waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's fascinating how completely she's cooperating, without even touching the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture suggests an eagerness that’s quite endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I imagine she’s quietly anticipating the sweet taste of a forbidden cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The innocence of children planning such a heist is truly something to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the precariousness of the stool at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost a perfectly orchestrated, small-scale rebellion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy manages to pass her one before anyone gets caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little moment of shared mischief is quite amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR
